definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness

sentences.english: And Sarah said, God hath made me to laugh, so that all that hear will laugh with me.
sentences.chinese: 撒拉說，神使我喜笑，凡聽見的必與我一同喜笑。

sentences.english: And Sarah said, God hath made me to laugh, so that all that hear will laugh with me.
sentences.chinese: 撒拉說，神使我喜笑，凡聽見的必與我一同喜笑。

sentences.english: She is clothed with strength and dignity; she can laugh at the days to come.
sentences.chinese: 能力和威儀是她的衣服，她想到日後的景況就喜笑。

sentences.english: God has brought me laughter, and everyone who hears about this will laugh with me.
sentences.chinese: 神使我喜笑，凡聽見的必與我一同喜笑。

definition: smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
to be laughing and playing/to giggle
face light up with delight (idiom); to beam with joy
